Article.ArticleTitle: Is there a role for the adrenal glands in long COVID?

Abstract.AbstractText: The symptoms of long COVID and chronic adrenal insufficiency have striking similarities. Therefore, we aim to raise awareness of assessing adrenal function in patients with long COVID.
